Africa Muslim Fest

Cape Town — November 2026
Celebrating African Muslim Leadership, Culture, Innovation, and Excellence

Get Involved

What is Africa Muslim Fest?

Africa Muslim Fest is not a single event but an ecosystem of communities, events, and organisations that will converge in Cape Town, South Africa.

The city will host the first-ever Africa Muslim Fest — a celebration of Muslim innovation, culture, and futures rooted in our tradition.

Instead of one organizer controlling the program, we bring together many partners: tech conferences, cultural showcases, wellness sessions, business forums, social impact initiatives, and spiritual gatherings. Each event has its own identity, but together they form part of the Africa Muslim Fest experience.

Our 8 Pillars

Africa Muslim Fest spans every dimension of Muslim life and futures. Each pillar gathers events, partners, and communities under a shared theme.

Innovation, Tech & AI

Startups, Technology, AI Ethics, Engineering, Design

Business & Finance

Islamic finance, entrepreneurship, halal trade, ethical investing, halaal FMCG

Community & Social Impact

NGO’s, Humanatarin, Climate Action, Justice, Circular Economy

Life, Wellness & Health

Nutrition,food, ecological living, healthcare, mental health,

Spirituality & Education

Qur’an, Sunnah, fiqh, philosophy, foresight, knowledge.

Arts, Culture & Sports

literature, design, calligraphy, adventure culture, fitness, architecture, Art

Media & Narrative

books, storytelling, journalism, podcasts, film/documentary, digital platforms.

Youth & Future Generations

Leadership, mentorship, next-gen innovation.

Host Your Event at Africa Muslim Fest

We welcome events of all sizes, across every pillar. Choose a format that fits your idea and community.

Multi-Day Events

Conferences, exhibitions, summits, education programs, workshops, and markets that span multiple days.

Single-Day Events

Forums, conferences, hackathons, performances, and workshops that run in a single day.

Micro Events

Meetups, panels, screenings, creative showcases, performances, galleries, social and sports gatherings.

Host Your Event
